name: Unknown Item
description: Enemy Mass Scaling is a mechanic that increases the mass of enemies over time, affecting various game interactions.
title: Enemy Mass Scaling

mechanics.mass_increase: Enemy mass increases by 4% each wave they are alive
mechanics.applies_to_all: This applies to all enemy types (Normal, Elite, Boss, Fleet)
mechanics.cumulative_effect: The mass increase is cumulative and continues to stack
mechanics.affects_interactions: Mass affects various game mechanics that depend on enemy weight/size

affected_mechanics.knockback_effects: Higher mass enemies are harder to knock back
affected_mechanics.ultimate_weapon_interactions: Some ultimate weapons have effects that scale with enemy mass
affected_mechanics.collision_detection: Mass may affect how enemies interact with each other and the environment
affected_mechanics.module_effects: Some modules may have effects that depend on enemy mass

strategic_implications: Enemies that survive multiple waves become harder to control with knockback effects
Some ultimate weapons may become less effective against high-mass enemies
Players should consider mass scaling when planning defensive strategies
The mechanic creates additional incentive to defeat enemies quickly
counterplay: Focus on defeating enemies before they accumulate too much mass
Use ultimate weapons that aren't affected by mass scaling
Consider using abilities that don't rely on knockback or mass-dependent effects
Prioritize high-mass enemies that are approaching the tower
